sense.gloss: to rise, to go up, to come up, to ascend, to be raised
to enter (esp. from outdoors), to come in, to go in
to enter (a school), to advance to the next grade
to get out (of water), to come ashore
to occur (esp. of a favourable result)
to be adequate (to cover expenses, etc.)
to be finished, to be done, to be over
to stop (working properly), to cut out, to give out, to die
to win (in a card game, etc.)
to get nervous, to get stage fright
to be offered (to the gods, etc.)

sdata.j: ↑空模様↑↓そらもよう↓から↑判断↑↓はんだん↓すると、↑午後↑↓ごご↓は↑晴↑↓は↓れ|↑上↑↓あ↓がる|でしょう。
sdata.e: Judging from the look of the sky, it will clear up in the afternoon.

sdata.j: ↑空↑↓そら↓はすぐに↑晴↑↓は↓れ|↑上↑↓あ↓がる|でしょう。
sdata.e: The sky will soon clear up.

sdata.j: ↑患者↑↓かんじゃ↓は↑起↑↓お↓き|↑上↑↓あ↓がる|ことを↑許↑↓ゆる↓された。
↑我々↑↓われわれ↓の↑立↑↓た↓ち|↑上↑↓あ↓がる|↑時↑↓とき↓がやって↑来↑↓き↓た。
sdata.e: The time has come for us to stand up.

sdata.j: ↑遠↑↓とお↓くに↑火↑↓ひ↓が↑燃↑↓も↓え|↑上↑↓あ↓がる|のが↑見↑↓み↓えた。
sdata.e: A fire was seen to blaze up far away.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が|↑上↑↓あ↓がる|とすぐにテニスの↑試合↑↓しあい↓を↑続行↑↓ぞっこう↓した。
sdata.e: When the rain stopped, the game of tennis was continued immediately.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が|↑上↑↓あ↓がる|と、↑子供↑↓こども↓たちは↑野球↑↓やきゅう↓を↑再開↑↓さいかい↓した。
sdata.e: When the weather had cleared, the children began to play baseball again.

sdata.j: ↑一生懸命↑↓いっしょうけんめい↓↑働↑↓はたら↓きなさい、そうすれば↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑給料↑↓きゅうりょう↓はだんだん|↑上↑↓あ↓がる|だろう。
sdata.e: Work hard, and your salary will be raised by degrees.

sdata.j: できるだけ↑高↑↓たか↓く↑飛↑↓と↓び|↑上↑↓あ↓がる|ようにしなさい。
sdata.e: Try to jump as high as possible.

sdata.j: それは↑１↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓か↑２日↑↓ふつか↓で↑仕|上↑↓しあ↓がる|。
sdata.e: It will be finished in a day or two.
